note.desc: (Re-)established as monastery by King Yoḥannǝs IV (r. 1872-86); possibly existed before as a church.
note.ab: Gädam. However, currently there is no monastic community. A "residence" of Yoḥannǝs IV (two building, recently restored) is located in the vicinity.
